name: Welcome Message
message: Welcome {$guest} and {$greeting}! We're so glad you're here in room {$roomNumber}, thanks for staying with us here at {$company}

name: Farewell Message
message: {$greeting} {$guest}, we hope you enjoyed your stay in room {$roomNumber}. Thank you from all of us here at {$company}.

name: Funny Message
message: {$greeting} from Boss Hog, Wade Boggs, Nanny Ogg and {$guest}. Coming at you live from {$roomNumber}.9 FM {$company}
